head.title: VERIZON RAISES STAKE IN WEST COAST COMPANY

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

hedline.hl1: VERIZON RAISES STAKE IN WEST COAST COMPANY

abstract.p: Verizon Wireless will pay $236 million to acquire 24.2 percent of Sacramento Valley LP from Roseville Communications, increasing its interest in company to more than 76 percent (S)

block.p: The nation's largest wireless carrier, Verizon Wireless, will increase its stake in Sacramento Valley L.P., a company that serves several cities in Nevada and Northern California. Under the terms of the transaction, Verizon Wireless will pay $236 million to acquire 24.2 percent of Sacramento Valley from Roseville Communications of Roseville, Calif., effectively increasing its interest in the company to more than 76 percent. Sacramento Valley serves an area with 3.8 million potential customers, including the cities of Sacramento and Modesto in California and Reno, Nev.
